channel.title: Comments on: Oil Rigs and Shakey-cams
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Drey
item.dc:creator: Drey
item.description: I think my friend Dan got motion sick from the movie. He got up at one point and never came back. I thought he had gone to the bathroom.
item.content:encoded: I think my friend Dan got motion sick from the movie. He got up at one point and never came back. I thought he had gone to the bathroom.

item.title: By: Monica
item.dc:creator: Monica
item.description: I went to Cloverfield last night and was sooooo sick! I spent most of it listening to the film, with quick peeks to see important stuff:(
item.content:encoded: I went to Cloverfield last night and was sooooo sick! I spent most of it listening to the film, with quick peeks to see important stuff:(
